sentences.sentence: With sigils, you reduce your typing time and can refer to a specific directory quickly and concisely.
sentences.translation: 使用符号，可以节省输入的时间，并且可以快速和精确地引用特定的目录。

sentences.sentence: Na:Each of these magical sigils needs to be touched at the same time in order to open the path to the talisman.
sentences.translation: 那些魔符必须被同时碰触，通往护符之路才会开启。
